price: Ó Profeta! Por certo, enviamo-te por testemunha e alvissareiro e admoestador,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
